Text: Thanks a lot for this torrent. Specially the album Children of God. Excellent!

I feel slightly guilty for pirating M. Gira's work, but it's very hard to find so I thought I'd help some people out.  Next time his Angels of Light come around, maybe try and go support him that way!  I hope he tours soon.

AAAAAAAAAH!
Thank you very much, and do not ever feel guilty because of pirating Mr. Gira's works - you did a good job
*thumbs up*

not too hard to find, though: http://younggodrecords.com or http://swans.pair.com

but thanks anyway.
